  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Razones trigonométricas. Operaciones. Identidades y ecuaciones</string>
            <string language="en">Trigonometric functions. Operations. Identities and equations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrische Funktionen. Operationen. 
Identitäten und Gleichungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions trigonométriques. Exécutions. 
Identités et équations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções trigonometric. Operações. 
Identidades e equações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni trigonometriche. Funzionamenti. 
Identità ed equazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Trigonometric λειτουργίες. Διαδικασίες. 
Ταυτότητες και εξισώσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la trigonometría. Se estudian las razones trigonométricas, las funciones trigonométricas, identidades y ecuaciones trigonométricas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses visuals to study trigonometry. The trigonometric ratios, trigonometric functions and trigonometric equations are studied</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ecuación</string>
            <string language="en">equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">razón trigonométrica</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric ratio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función trigonométrica</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">identidad</string>
            <string language="en">identity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Sichtbarmachungen, Trigonometrie zu studieren. Die 
trigonometrischen Verhältnisse, die trigonometrischen Funktionen und 
die trigonometrischen Gleichungen werden studiert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
visuels d'étudier la trigonométrie. Les taux 
trigonométriques, les fonctions trigonométriques et les équations 
trigonométriques sont étudiés</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos visuals estudar o 
trigonometry. As relações trigonometric, as funções 
trigonometric e as equações trigonometric são estudadas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi rappresentazioni 
studiare trigonometria. I rapporti trigonometrici, le funzioni 
trigonometriche e le equazioni trigonometriche sono studiati</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τα visuals 
trigonometry μελέτης. Οι trigonometric αναλογίες, οι 
trigonometric λειτουργίες και οι trigonometric εξισώσεις 
μελετώνται</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrie</string>
          </keyword>
